thread.title: Twitter names Jack Dorsey as permanent CEO
thread.title_full: Twitter names Jack Dorsey as permanent CEO

title: Twitter names Jack Dorsey as permanent CEO
text: Twitter names Jack Dorsey as permanent CEO Monday, 5 October 2015 (10 minutes ago) Jack Dorsey will drop the "interim CEO" title and become the permanent chief executive of Twitter. The company just announced the news and board members are placing their full support behind Dorsey, who will also remain CEO of Square. That double duty initially was seen as a strike against Dorsey remaining Twitter's top executive for the long term; at one point the board publicly stated it was searching for someone who could take on the role full time — as most CEOs do. Twitter to Name Jack Dorsey CEO: Re/Code 01:07 Sept. 30 -- Twitter’s board has selected Jack Dorsey as chief executive officer, making his position permanent after the co-founder stepped in three months ago on an interim basis, Re/code reported. Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu and Mark Crumpton report on "Bloomberg Markets." Recent related news Mr. Dorsey has been aggressively making changes at Twitter while serving as interim chief since Dick Costolo, the company’s chief for about five years, stepped...
